author: IGN
description:
Ninja Gaiden 4 puts a fresh face in the spotlight: you’ll be playing a lot of the game as Bloodraven ninja Yakumo, not the dragon clan legend Ryu Hayabusa. This game is intended to be a jumping-on point for new players, and if you’re one of them, then you’re going to need these 11 essential combat tips. And if you’re a veteran, it’s always good to get back to basics.

0:00 - Intro
0:29 - For the Love of God, Block!
1:18 - Cancel Combos with Shurikens
1:44 - Purchase & Practice New Skills
2:44 - Drop It Like It’s Hot
3:41 - Upgrade Your Ultimates
4:24 - Save Your Blood Essence Orbs
4:55 - Don’t Stop Moving
5:38 - Don’t Button Mash!
6:13 - Break Guards with Bloodraven Form
6:56 - Use Your Items
7:36 - Pause for Purgatory
title: Ninja Gaiden 4: 11 Essential Combat Tips for New Ninjas

author: IGN
description: One of gaming's premiere action games is finally back after 13 years. Here are the first 21 minutes of gameplay from Ninja Gaiden 4.
title: The First 21 Minutes of Ninja Gaiden 4

author: IGN
description:
Ninja Gaiden 4 is a thrilling revival that features some of the best combat you'll find in video games. A poor story, uninspired level design, and a disappointing new lead character break its stride, but never to the point of diminishing the thrilling action of this great revival. 
Review by Mitchell Saltzman on PC. Also available on Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5.
title: Ninja Gaiden 4 Review

author: IGN
description:
Ninja Gaiden 4 brings a new hero to the forefront. Yakumo doesn’t have the same legendary status as Ryu Hayabusa, but with the right skills, he just might get there. The thing is, there are a ton of new skills to choose from as you progress through Tokyo, so this video is here to help you grab the right ones. We’ve picked 10 skills you should get first, with the majority being part of your general combat abilities, and a pair of weapon-specific skills to boot.

0:00 - Intro
0:34 - How to Unlock Skills
1:31 - Flying Swallow + Flying Swallow Barrage
2:11 - Izuna Drop
3:00 - Ultimate Guidance
3:52 - Landing Ultimate Technique
4:18 - Fatal Flash
5:09 - Perfect Block
5:40 - Art of Defense
6:02 - Chain Link
6:44 - Takeminakata - Heel Strike
7:19 - Takeminakata - Spiral Shadow
title: Ninja Gaiden 4: 10 Combat Skills to Get First

author: IGN
description: Check out 11 minutes of gameplay of Ninja Gaiden 4, played on the hardest difficulty of Master Ninja. This video covers most of the major combat encounters of the first level, Bloodsoaked Tokyo.
title: Ninja Gaiden 4 - 11 Mins of Master Ninja Difficulty

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Microsoft is saying the controversial price of the ROG Xbox Ally X wasn't set by them, but rather hardware maker ASUS. The Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X are $599 and $999 respectively, and feature Xbox-themed UI and connect to the users' Xbox accounts, but are technically ASUS products under the ROG brand. Despite the price, Microsoft claims the devices have sold out on the Xbox store and other retailers, and the critical response has been overall positive, despite the steep price. In other news, Final Fantasy 7 Remake Part 3's co-director is saying that the game's combat system is not yet decided, despite calls for the series to return to turn-based roots. This comes after the surprise success of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, which features many game mechanics popularized by JRPGs like classic FF titles. And finally, a leak about more Resident Evil remakes may prove to be real, with reports saying Resident Evil 0 and Code Veronica are next on Capcom's to-do list.
title: Xbox Boss Blames ASUS For ROG Ally X's $1000 Price Tag - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
title: The Icon Blue PS5 controller is inspired by PlayStation's shades of blue! #ps5 #blue #ign #gaming

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Marvel Zombies Mode Gameplay Trailer for Marvel Rivals, the hit free-to-play action team-based hero shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players can soon jump into the first PvE mode coming to Marvel Rivals with Marvel Zombies Mode. Survive wave after wave of zombies, making good use of hero abilities across a suite of locations. Marvel Zombies Mode launches on October 23 for Marvel Rivals for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#MarvelRivals #IGN #Gaming
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Marvel Zombies Mode Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Third-Person Update Trailer for Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, the hit action-adventure game based on the world of Avatar, developed by Ubisoft. Players can soon access the Third-Person Update, bringing the game to an all-new perspective alongside New Game+, and more updates. The Third-Person Update is launching on December 5 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Official Third-Person Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
ID@Xbox returns once again and just in time for the Halloween season! Microsoft and IGN are teaming up to bring you a ton of new looks at exciting titles from indie studios such as Raw Fury, Don'tNod, Serenity Forge, Playtonic, and much more. Tune in to IGN on Tuesday October 28th at 10am PT | 1pm ET for roughly 50 minutes of new content across all genres of video gaming. 

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase Livestream

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the PS5 Gameplay Trailer for Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl, the hit first-person open-world post-apocalyptic survival game developed by GSC Game World. Players will head straight into the fray with deadly enemies, anomalies, and more to survive in the Chornobyl Exclusion Zone. Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl is launching on November 20 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), with the game being available now for Xbox Series X|S and PC (Steam).
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Official PS5 Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
With The Outer Worlds 2 imminently about to drop, we think it's a good time to brush up on the fundamentals of Obsidian's high-concept sci-ifi universe and recount the events of the Outer Worlds. 

This will work nicely as a refresher for people who finished The Outer Worlds ages ago, and also as a primer for those of you diving into the sequel without any prior knowledge. It goes without saying, then, that what follows contains spoilers for The Outer Worlds 1. Here's everything that happened in The Outer Worlds.

#IGN #TheOuterWorlds2 #TheOuterWorldsRecap
title: Everything That Happened in The Outer Worlds (Before Playing The Outer Worlds 2)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Ichibe Hyosube Reveal Trailer for Bleach Rebirth of Souls, an anime 3D action fighting game developed by Tamsoft Corporation. 

Players can soon access Ichibe Hyosube, a daunting and towering fighter with a dense beard and a thirst for battle. 

Ichibe Hyosube is launching into Early Access on October 21, with an official launch on October 28 for Bleach Rebirth of Souls for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Bleach #BleachRebirthOfSouls
title: Bleach Rebirth of Souls - Official Ichibe Hyosube Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Angry Birds 2 trailer to see what to expect with Angry Birds 2 Space, a limited-time in-game community event that brings back the iconic Angry Birds Space biome, reimagined and upgraded for a fresh, modern experience in Angry Birds 2. Angry Birds 2 Space will be available to Angry Birds 2 players from October 24 through November 21 on iOS and Android devices.

New gameplay features in Angry Birds 2 Space include the new gravity system, gravity-defying elements with master orbital mechanics across weekly themed events in a fresh space biome, and planet hopping.

#IGN #AngryBirds2 #AngryBirds
title: Angry Birds 2 - Official Angry Birds 2 Space Announcement Trailer
